data.title: Silver Saturday
data.meta_description: Seven finals in one action-packed day. Silver Saturday returns on 27 April as Scotland's top men's and women's teams battle for silverware at Scottish Gas Murrayfield and Hive Stadium.
data.text:
Tickets are on sale for this year’s Silver Saturday event. Contested on the day will be the Scottish Cup, Sarah Beaney Cup, Women’s Plate final, Men’s National League Cup final, Men’s and Women’s Shield finals, and the Men’s National Bowl final.

You can also watch the Sarah Beaney Cup final live on BBC ALBA (kick-off 4.30pm). The Women’s Shield final (kick-off 11am), Men’s National League Cup final (kick-off 1.45pm), and Scottish Cup final (kick-off 7.15pm) will be streamed live on the Scottish Rugby website.

A highlights package of the Men’s Bowl final, Men’s Shield final and Women’s Plate final will be available on the Scottish Rugby website and social media channels on Sunday 28 April.

Fixtures

Men’s Bowl final, Hive Stadium, 11am kick off:

Irvine RFC v Blairgowrie RFC

Women’s Shield final, Scottish Gas Murrayfield, 11am kick off:

Live from 10:50am on Scottish Rugby website

Biggar RFC v West of Scotland FC

Men’s Shield final, Hive Stadium, 1.45pm kick off:

Cumnock RFC v Moray RFC

Men’s National League Cup final, Scottish Gas Murrayfield, 1.45pm kick off:

Live from 1:35pm on Scottish Rugby website

Lasswade RFC v Falkirk RFC

Women’s Plate final, Hive Stadium, 4.30pm kick off:

Caithness Krakens v Uddingston RFC

Sarah Beaney Cup final, Scottish Gas Murrayfield, 4.30pm kick off:

Live on BBC ALBA

Watsonian FC v Hillhead Jordanhill RFC

Scottish Cup final, Scottish Gas Murrayfield, 7.15pm kick off:

Live on Scottish Rugby website from 7:05pm

Hawick RFC v Edinburgh Academical

On the day

Gates will open at 10am for spectators, with a range of food and drink options available throughout the day.

You can view up-to-date fixtures and results on the day HERE.

Earn club commission

Finalist rugby clubs can earn commission on Silver Saturday 2024 match tickets if purchased through the club’s unique URL. If you want to support your rugby club in this way, please ensure you use the URL of the club you wish to support.

Once you click on the link, you’ll be taken to the Scottish Rugby Online Ticket Centre to make your purchase in the standard way. Club URLs can be found here.

Ticketing

The ticketing portal is now live. If you intend on watching your team only, please wait until your team is confirmed to be in the final and playing at Silver Saturday before purchasing tickets. Tickets are non-refundable as per the ticketing terms and conditions.

Prices Advance Matchday Adult £10.00 £15 Senior 60+ £5.00 £10 Under 18 £5.00 £5

You will receive your tickets through Scottish Rugby’s ticketing app. If you have not already, you can download the app here.

Media accreditation
